snippet: Travelocity is giving away a trip around the world as part of a marketing campaign featuring Roaming Gnome.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes Travelocity is giving away a trip around the world as part of marketing campaign featuring its character Roaming Gnome.
lead_paragraph: Travelocity is giving away a trip around the world as part of a marketing campaign featuring Roaming Gnome.

headline.seo: A Gnome Is Home, but More Travel Beckons
